para.verbatim:
**Please do not hand edit .ui files, as qt's xml formt is fragile and its tools are inconsistent across platforms on tolerance to bad constructs.**
Instead prefer qdesigner5 to make edits to the .ui documents. If you are allergic to gui tools, then **at least**, after making hand edits, prior to checking them in, load the file in qdesigner5, ensure it loads without error, and then **save the file back out, and check that in**, so that the next developer using qdesigner5 does not contend with unrelated diffs.

listitem.para: Please run the tests in pxr/usdImaging/bin/testusdview, and add new ones whenever possible.
See blackBoxTesting.md, and please add to it when adding features that cannot be tested by testusdview
